info.name: üìó AlphaPay API Documentation
info.description:
Welcome to the AlphaPay API - a comprehensive payment platform that enables secure user authentication, profile management, card handling, bill payments, and digital transactions.

## üìã Quick Start Guide

### Authorization
- **{{authToken}}**: JWT token for authenticated users. Obtained after successful login/registration.
- **{{adminToken}}**: JWT token for admin users. Obtained after admin login.
- All protected endpoints require the `Authorization: Bearer {{authToken}}` or `Authorization: Bearer {{adminToken}}` header.

### Environment Variables
- **baseUrl**: `http://localhost:3000/api/v1` (Base URL for all API requests locally)
- **authToken**: Your user JWT token (set after login/sign-up)
- **adminToken**: Your admin JWT token (set after admin login)

### Recommended Testing Flow
1. Register a new user: `POST /users/auth/register`
2. Verify OTP: `POST /users/auth/verify-otp`
3. Login: `POST /users/auth/login` ‚Üí Copy token to {{authToken}}
4. Get Profile: `GET /users`
5. Add Card: `POST /users/cards/register-card`
6. Create Bill: `POST /users/bills/register-bill`
7. Transfer Funds: `POST /users/transactions/user-to-user`

### Response Format
All responses follow this structure:
- **Success (2xx)**: Returns data object with status message
- **Error (4xx/5xx)**: Returns error message and status code
- **Validation**: Always included in request parameters

### Security Notes
- Passwords are hashed and never returned in responses
- UPI PINs are required for all transactions.
